resources.string: Your app is authenticated. Now you can post tweet/image on twitter.
Error occured while posting a tweet.
*even if your sleeping schedule is messy please try to input the closest to your average sleep hours (per 24h) option!
*please enter the time you usually wake up in the morning.
It is highly recommended that you begin \"STAGE1\" within the following morning (usually your first cigarette for the day).
It is very important that you register every cigarette you smoke! You may experience difficulties if you don\'t do so!
hold for 2sec \n to register a cigarette
Once activated by you \"STAGE 2\" is designed to begin from the following \"wake-up hours\"

You are about to enter \"STAGE 1\" which is designed to study your smoking habits for 5 full days.
It is highly recommended to begin the stage with the new day for achieving clear results throughout! After completing \"STAGE 1\" you will be shown info on where you stand as a smoker and how long it is likely to take you to complete the whole therapy based on the results you have shown.
\"STAGE 2\" is when the actual program begins so it is also highly recommended that you start it with the beginning of next day! From that point on the app will be taking care of your smoking habit until the end!

You have reached the end of our journey together. Do you want to know a little secret? The magic behind the whole process is you and your willingness to change for better! We were here as your personal guide only. Finally, we hope you feel fully satisfied and happy with the results you have gained throughout the therapy! Now enjoy one last cigarette before you step into your new smoke-free lifestyle! Team Basicks

After a few months of studies, research, health stats collection and anonymous questionnaires we came up with a method, that helps people quit smoking without the need of a \"nicotine replacement\". The mixture of technology, mathematics, our own studies and ideas brought this App to life. We truly believe in the positive results of our project and it\'s simply a matter of time you start believing too! Help us help other people get back to their smoke-free lifestyle by sharing and spreading the word about Smoke TherApp within your social networks. We hope that with your help we could set the beginning of something revolutionary that will assist millions of people throughout their journey to their healthier lifestyle. Thank you!

Smoke TherApp is the revolutionary quit smoking self-therapy brought to you by the young and ambitions team of \"Basicks studio\". If you are finally ready to make that step ahead and change your lifestyle to better then look no further! We all know that smoking is both addiction and habit at the same time, right? At some point in every smoker\'s life cigarettes become that stress relief tool which is not always the case! It is all about the individual mindset. Our team has designed this app in a different way so it acts as your personal therapist! Please take a minute to get familiar with how this whole program works. Fully committing to the therapy guarantees 100% success towards your smoke free lifestyle!

You have reached your daily cigarette allowance!

If you are still experiencing bad carvings it means you are not ready to proceed any further at the time being!

Smoking this extra cigarette over your daily allowance will extend your therapy with an extra day.
